content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-29.5, 30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -29.5, 30.5), boiler (position -24.5, -50.0), and offshore pump (position -10.5, 25.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18.0, -49.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position not specified) and inserter (position not specified) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position not specified) that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing a pipe without having it in inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to place them. In this case, ensure you have pipes in your inventory before trying to place a pipe.

### Errors when connecting boiler to steam engine without pipes
- Always check your inventory for the necessary components (pipes) before attempting to connect entities like boilers and steam engines.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity in a tile before attempting to place it. This includes checking for existing entities in the intended position.
